{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=Smart Home Gateway |revision=(HG100) |asin= |est_release_date=02/06/2016 |fcc_date=04/02/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=smart home hub, access point |fcc_id=MSQ-RK903, W7Z-ZICM357SP0 |ic_id=3568A-RK903, 8254A-ZICM357SP0 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3066 |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=SK hynix |fla1_model=H26M41103HPR |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TC4G63AFR-PBA |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, HDMI, |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Rockchip RK903 |wi1_module_if=SDIO |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4330 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM40183 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211N |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Bluetooth 4.0 Chip;Broadcom;BCM40183;;1; ,,, Mesh Networking SoC for ZigBee;Silicon Labs;EM357;;1; |flags=Bluetooth, ZigBee, HDMI 2.0 |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;Android; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Smart Home Gateway}} :[https://www.asus.com/sg/Internet-of-Things/ASUS-SmartHome-Gateway-HG100/ Product page] (SG)
"ASUS HG100 REV.1.03A" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
*[[ASUS HG100]] - ''Smart Home Gateway'' • [http://armdevices.net/2016/02/18/asus-hg100-rk3066-smart-home-gateway-via-zigbeewifi-bluetooth/ PR] • [https://mysmahome.com/news/4305/asus-debuts-smart-home-series-using-zigbee-2/ PR] • [https://mysmahome.com/product/6285/product-introduction-asus-smart-home-gateway-hg100/ PR] • [https://www.asus.com/sg/Internet-of-Things/ASUS-SmartHome-Gateway-HG100/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RK903 MSQ-RK903] (2015-04-02), CPU: ''Rockchip'' RK3066 (1.5GHz) :Flash/RAM: 8/1GB, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, ZigBee, HDMI 2.0 (4K H.265)
*CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3066 @1.6GHz (Dual Core Cortex-A9) *WLAN/BT: [[Rockchip]] RK903 - WLAN/BT Combo Module :Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 4.0 (HS) + FM Rx SIP Module • [http://cs5-1.4pda.to/2594543/wifi.jpg SDIO] :RK903 - [[Broadcom]] BCM40183 (RK901 - BCM40181) *ZigBee: CEL MeshConnect EM300 Series Module :''Silicon Labs'' EM357 - Mesh Networking SoC for ZigBee
